title: 'My mom walks away from me while still talking': 20 of the Most Annoying Parenting Habits
description: It's hard to be on the receiving end of questionable parenting habits. When your mom or dad is being ridiculous, frustrating, or just all-around crazy, calling them out on their nonsense does not always help the situation get any better. These Redditors understand that conundrum all too well.Some of these frustrating parenting habits can range from universally annoying ticks to uncharacteristically specific quirks and eccentricities. For instance, we've got plenty of folks discussing their parents' tendencies to speak out of turn or share privileged information with other family members. That's on the more common side of habits. So is the scenario when your parents call your name from another room and then never tell you what they need from you when you respond. However, your dad calling you by a different one of his sibling's names and never apologizing for the mistake is not exactly a classic parenting lapse in judgment.Keep scrolling below for 20 of the most annoying parenting habits. For more content like this, check out this story about two twin sisters who got on each other's nerves at school.
author: BenWeiss
excerpt: 'My mom walks away from me while still talking': 20 of the Most Annoying Parenting Habits - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.

html:
It's hard to be on the receiving end of questionable parenting habits. When your mom or dad is being ridiculous, frustrating, or just all-around crazy, calling them out on their nonsense does not always help the situation get any better. These Redditors understand that conundrum all too well.

Some of these frustrating parenting habits can range from universally annoying ticks to uncharacteristically specific quirks and eccentricities. For instance, we've got plenty of folks discussing their parents' tendencies to speak out of turn or share privileged information with other family members. That's on the more common side of habits. So is the scenario when your parents call your name from another room and then never tell you what they need from you when you respond. However, your dad calling you by a different one of his sibling's names and never apologizing for the mistake is not exactly a classic parenting lapse in judgment.

Keep scrolling below for 20 of the most annoying parenting habits. For more content like this, check out this story about two twin sisters who got on each other's nerves at school.
